Articles.Content:
So im making a planet with Kopernicus and everytime I load the game it is stuck on a loading screen so I checked the logs and it says: 

[LOG 15:23:50]: [Kopernicus]: Configuration.Loader: Failed to load Body: Earth: Object reference not set to an instance of an object

What fix is there?

 

Edit: I feel really dumb for this but I just messed up some file locations

Edited April 25 by RunarLogi
fix
